All borrowings through this line of credit (framework agreement) are repaid with revenues from mining projects managed by Sicomines SARL. Each subsidiary loan issued through the line of credit carries a maturity of 25 years and an interest rate of 6-month LIBOR plus a 1% margin (or 3.839% at the time of the agreement).
